name: Dictionary App
description: A dictionary app that supports searching, saving and categorizing words. Utilizes Discord OAuth2 to facilitate user accounts.

name: Pixel Canvas
description: Collaborative app where users can create and draw on canvases in real-time. Uses WebSockets for live pixel updates and chat messages.

name: Shot Clock
description: Billiards shot clock compliant with competitive play. Integrates WebSockets for user-created clocks and real time synchronization across all connections.

name: Photo Tagging App
description: A where's Waldo style game with an online leaderboard. Encorporates Firebase for anonymous accounts as well as storage of locational data and scores.

name: Age Calculator
description: App to view someone's exact age by years, months, or days. Employs search parameters to create savable and shareable stats.

name: Flamin' Finger
description: Recreation of the 2003 arcade game plus an online leaderboard. Employs a modified randomized DFS algorithm for path generation.
